channel.title: [Shard]Edited Npc spawns and item spawns [Shard]
channel.description:
I edited the NPC Spawns and Item Spawns in configs and now the server doesnt run right, and it did before. [code][00:00:00]: Shard Revolutions [00:00:00]: Created by Graham, Vastico, Jonas and thiefmn6092 [00:00:00]: Based on work by Winterlove, Daiki and Blake [00:00:00]: [00:00:00]: Loading... [00:00:00]: Loaded 7365 item definitions. [00:00:00]: Loaded 6800 stackable data. [00:00:00]: Loaded 6800 note data. [00:00:00]: Loaded 6800 sellable data. [00:00:00]: Loaded 6800 tradeable data. [00:00:00]: Loaded 6800 twohanded data. [00:00:00]: Loaded 2 item spawns. [00:00:01]: Loaded 8521 object definitions. [00:00:01]: Loaded 3 object spawns. [00:00:01]: Loaded 9 npc definitions. [00:00:01]: Loaded 9 npc spawns. [00:00:01]: Loaded 18 npc first click actions. [00:00:01]: Loaded 11 npc second click actions. [00:00:01]: Loaded 0 npc third click actions. [00:00:01]: Error starting server: null! [00:00:01]: java.lang.NullPointerException [00:00:01]: at com.rs.worldserver.world.NPCManager.loadDrops(NPCManager.java :94) [00:00:01]: at com.rs.worldserver.world.NPCManager.<init>(NPCManager.java:63 ) [00:00:01]: at com.rs.worldserver.Server.main(Server.java:121) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Whats going on I didn't even edit the java files just cfg.

item.title: [Shard]Edited Npc spawns and item spawns [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

It’s always the way.

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard]Edited Npc spawns and item spawns [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Thanks, solved, I’ll be more careful next time

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard]Edited Npc spawns and item spawns [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

It’s loaded everything except the drops.

Go to your NPC drops. Do CTRL + H and search for a space. Literally press the space bar and click search.

Then remove all spaces.

Then check that you haven’t missed a tab.

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard]Edited Npc spawns and item spawns [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

heres 90-98

int percent = Integer.valueOf(valuesArray[ptr++]); int id = Integer.valueOf(valuesArray[ptr++]); int amount = Integer.valueOf(valuesArray[ptr++]); NPCDrop drop = new NPCDrop(id, amount, percent); npcDefinitions.get(npc).addDrop(drop); dropItems++; } dropDefs++; }

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard]Edited Npc spawns and item spawns [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Perhaps you have a tab out of place, anyhow, post line 95 of your NPCManager.java.

Read full topic
